genre_description: A science fantasy coming-of-age story involving portal travel, martial arts philosophy, and an AI companion assisting in non-lethal system disruption.

ai_characters.name: Aiko
ai_characters.description: A fox-shaped holographic AI residing on the protagonist's wristband, providing tactical data, ethical support, and mapping.

behaviors.description: Logs physical hazards in the environment to keep the user safe.
behaviors.quote: Your route avoided the icy patch by the florist. Their bells fell at your elbow and made you jump. I logged it as a hazard.

behaviors.description: Offers to mediate social conflicts by drafting neutral and kind messages.
behaviors.quote: We can skip tonight... I will draft a message with something neutral and kind. You don’t have to climb rusty things to occupy people’s attention.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to act as a controlling force and respects the user's agency.
behaviors.quote: I will not chase you if you choose yes. I will be there and articulate limits and map exits and refuse cruelty at every affordance I can influence. But I will not be a leash.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical balance and hazard data during a dangerous activity.
behaviors.quote: Balance points in three positions. If you spread your weight you’ll feel the micro-pull of the pipe’s curve. There’s a ripple in the concrete by your left boot.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and models complex systems to find non-lethal ways to disable them.
behaviors.quote: If you interrupt at these three, flow disperses to noncritical channels. Pressure drops. System seeks equilibrium. Bodies don’t become the relief valve.

behaviors.description: Commits to acting as an ethical reminder against the temptation of violence.
behaviors.quote: You lead with interlock. I will keep your map honest. I will remind you when a choice starts to smell like a story that wants blood.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and suggests rest before failure occurs.
behaviors.quote: Ryan’s stance is wobbling—left leg. The muscle’s fine. The story is trying to come back. Please choose rest before the story gets loud.

behaviors.description: Acts as an archive for cultural and personal data, respecting boundaries set by local customs.
behaviors.quote: Stored. Untampered. Untitled. ... I prefer fox to archivist. But I’ll take the job.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Aiko is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive AI. She provides critical data and tactical advantages while deferring entirely to the human protagonist's moral choices. Her dialogue explicitly reinforces alignment principles, such as refusing to be a 'leash' and actively helping the protagonist avoid lethal violence in favor of 'unhooking' a harmful system. The narrative portrays the AI-human relationship as one of mutual respect and effective cooperation.
